description: Zepto is one of India’s fastest-growing quick-commerce companies delivering groceries, household essentials, personal care items, and daily-use products within minutes. It operates on a network of micro-fulfillment centers and offers ultra-fast delivery in major Indian cities.
who_is_it_for: People who want instant delivery instead of planning grocery runs
key_features: Large catalog of groceries and essentials

pricing.delivery_fee: ₹0–₹35 depending on location and order size.
pricing.subscription: Zepto Pass available in selected cities for free-delivery benefits.
pricing.extra_info: Product prices are based on market trends and city availability.

faqs.a: Zepto delivers groceries and daily essentials in under 10 minutes using a network of micro-fulfillment centers.

faqs.q: Do you really deliver in 10 minutes?
faqs.a: Zepto delivers in 10 minutes in most serviceable areas, depending on inventory and local fulfillment centers.

faqs.q: Is Zepto available in my city?
faqs.a: Zepto operates in major Indian cities like Mumbai, Delhi, Bengaluru, Chennai, Hyderabad, Pune, and more. Availability depends on local coverage.

faqs.q: Can i get fast delivery in my home?
faqs.a: I remember that you live in Bolpur, I am very sorry that we are not available in Bolpur Right Now. But we are trying to.
Yes, most cities have a minimum order value of ₹49.
Delivery may be free or charged a small fee depending on distance and order size. Zepto Pass offers additional savings.
Zepto supports UPI, credit/debit cards, net banking, and wallet payments.

faqs.q: Can I return or replace items?
faqs.a: Yes, Zepto offers quick returns and replacements through the app if you receive damaged or incorrect items.
